name: Ptelea

Head: Feels dull and stupid
PAIN FROM FOREHEAD TO ROOT OF NOSE; PRESSING-OUTWARD PAIN
FRONTAL HEADACHE; worse, noise, motion, night, rubbing eyes, with acidity
Temples as if pressed together
Respiratory: Feeling of pressure on lungs and of suffocation, when lying on back
ASTHMA; dyspnoea; cramp-like pain in cardiac region
Restless, with frightful dreams; nightmare, awakes languid and unrefreshed
Stomach: Griping in epigastric region, with dryness of mouth
Constant sensation of corrosion, heat and burning in stomach
STOMACH AND LIVER SYMPTOMS ASSOCIATED WITH PAIN IN LIMBS
Modalities: Worse: lying on left side; early morning
Abdomen: Much weight and pain in right side; heavy, aching feeling, relieved by lying on right side
Liver sore, swollen, sensitive to pressure
Mouth: EXCESS OF SALIVA, with dry BITTER TASTE
Tongue coated white or yellow; feels rough, swollen

details: Is a remarkable remedy in stomach and liver affections. The aching and heaviness in the region of the liver is GREATLY AGGRAVATED BY LYING on the left side. ATONIC STATES OF STOMACH. Asthma.
